trans-unit.resname: J14·1 | Karador, Ghost Chieftain | Card Text
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard. Once during each of your turns, you may cast a creature spell from your graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: J14·1 | Karador, Ghost Chieftain | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Death tried to uncrown me. But now I return, king of a greater realm."

trans-unit.resname: J14·1★ | Plains | Card Text
J14·2 | Greater Good | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.

trans-unit.resname: J14·2 | Greater Good | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "To examine the causes of life, we must first have recourse to death."\n—Mary Shelley, *Frankenstein*

trans-unit.resname: J14·2★ | Island | Card Text
J14·3 | Riku of Two Reflections | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {U}{R}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G}{U}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

trans-unit.resname: J14·3★ | Swamp | Card Text
J14·4 | Force of Will | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell.

trans-unit.resname: J14·4★ | Mountain | Card Text
J14·5 | Hanna, Ship's Navigator | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

trans-unit.resname: J14·5 | Hanna, Ship's Navigator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I never thought I'd spend my life fighting. I'm a maker, not a destroyer."

trans-unit.resname: J14·5★ | Forest | Card Text
J14·6 | Sword of Feast and Famine | Card Text
J14·7 | Nekusar, the Mindrazer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card. Whenever an opponent draws a card, Nekusar, the Mindrazer deals 1 damage to that player.

trans-unit.resname: J14·7 | Nekusar, the Mindrazer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: His enemies wondered if the lich king's brutal death and unnatural rebirth had been his plan all along.

trans-unit.resname: J14·8 | Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Vigilance Other creatures you control get +2/+2. Creatures your opponents control get -2/-2.

trans-unit.resname: J14·8 | Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: J14·9 | Oloro, Ageless Ascetic | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Oloro, Ageless Ascetic
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: J14·9 | Oloro, Ageless Ascetic | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 2 life. Whenever you gain life, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card and each opponent loses 1 life. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Oloro, Ageless Ascetic is in the command zone, you gain 2 life.
